Class CoordWrapper

java.lang.Object
  NPTLab.CoordWrapper
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoordWrapperUserMap
public class CoordWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Class that wraps th class Coord in an object that adds an univoque ID to a couple of Coordinates (x,y)
